name: 如果成为勇者后只剩下一小时生命该如何打倒魔王活下去？
name_original: 如果成为勇者后只剩下一小时生命该如何打倒魔王活下去？
description:
In the game, you will play a cursed hero. You have only one hour left in your life. In this hour, you need to find ways to improve your strength, and then defeat the devil to save yourself.

Game Features:

  • Unexpected storyline.
  • Simple and exciting combat experience.
  • Beautifully portraits and background music.
  • Up to dozens of different endings.
  • Your game time is only 1 hour.

Character introduction:


This is the protagonist.


the girl calls herself the devil.


the Grave keeper calls himself the sage.

Game shortcomings:

  • The process is shorter.
  • Common RPGMAKER style.
  • Weird plots may not be right for you.
  • Your game time is only 1 hour.
